title: Create suite form/modal
description: Implement the form for creating a new evaluation suite. Can be a dedicated page or modal. Include validation and feedback on success/failure.
acceptance_criteria: Scorer selection (multi-select from tool_selection, reasoning, grounding)
Success: navigate to new suite detail page
Error: show error message, keep form state
Cancel button returns to suites list
implementation_notes: Use React Hook Form or native form handling
Consider reusing form for edit functionality
SuiteForm component should accept initialValues for edit mode
Scorer selection could be checkboxes or multi-select
